guide.introduction: We will be using freely available tools like Google SketchUp to design and finally fabricate a chassis for a robot.
guide.introduction_rendered:
We will be using freely available tools like Google SketchUp to design and finally fabricate a chassis for a robot.

Relevant parts
  • acrylic sheet 2mm
  • Glue
Tools
  • Printer
  • Rotary tool with cut-off wheel
  • scale or vernier calipers

lines.text: Use a a scale or, preferably, a vernier caliper to measure the parts you already have, then recreate them in SketchUp.
lines.text_raw: Use a a scale or, preferably, a vernier caliper to measure the parts you already have, then recreate them in SketchUp.

lines.text: When creating the board in SketchUp create only the big parts that stick out to save time.
lines.text_raw: When creating the board in SketchUp create only the big parts that stick out to save time.

lines.text: Create the chassis in the shape you prefer.
lines.text_raw: Create the chassis in the shape you prefer.

lines.text: You can create slots by subtracting the slot's shape from the chassis.
lines.text_raw: You can create slots by subtracting the slot's shape from the chassis.

lines.text: Assemble the parts in Google SketchUp.
lines.text_raw: Assemble the parts in Google SketchUp.

lines.text: See if all the parts fit together.
lines.text_raw: See if all the parts fit together.

lines.text: Print the outline of the parts for the chassis.
lines.text_raw: Print the outline of the parts for the chassis.

lines.text: Use the option that keeps the size of the printout to the actual size.
lines.text_raw: Use the option that keeps the size of the printout to the actual size.

lines.text: Check the measurements after printing to be double-sure.
lines.text_raw: Check the measurements after printing to be double-sure.

lines.text: Paste the printout on the material you want to cut the chassis from.
lines.text_raw: Paste the printout on the material you want to cut the chassis from.

lines.text: Take care when pasting the printout that there are no creases in it.
lines.text_raw: Take care when pasting the printout that there are no creases in it.

lines.text: Use a rotary tool or a hacksaw to cut out your shapes.
lines.text_raw: Use a rotary tool or a hacksaw to cut out your shapes.

lines.text: Use super glue to stick the parts together.
lines.text_raw: Use super glue to stick the parts together.

lines.text: I made the parts like jigsaw pieces so they meshed together to give more strength.
lines.text_raw: I made the parts like jigsaw pieces so they meshed together to give more strength.

lines.text: Screw in the other parts like motors, caster wheels, etc.
lines.text_raw: Screw in the other parts like motors, caster wheels, etc.

lines.text: Finished chassis with the InduinoX board.
lines.text_raw: Finished chassis with the InduinoX board.
